channel.title: Quality Engineering Logbook
channel.description: Recent content on Quality Engineering Logbook

item.title: Nice to meet you!
item.description: Hey! I couldn’t start posting about agile methodologies, software development, testing and quality in general and related topics from our day to day before introducing myself. I’m Tiago Góes, or just “Góes”, Brazilian, Software Quality Engineer since 2018, before that, I worked as Software Requirements Analyst for two years, completed IT technican course (2011-2013) and degree Analisis and software development in 2016. I like practicing sports (I did Taekwondo from 9 to 19), learn new technologies, aaaaand quality engineering.
